titleStmt.title: The Devils reign upon earth, being a relation of several sad and bloudy murthers lately committed, especially that of Sir Geo. Sands his son, upon his own brother; set forth that others may be terrified from the like thereby, the like being never known in any age before.

notesStmt.note: Woodcuts on title page and on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
